welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sabaudia, Brazil! Known for its stunning beaches and charming atmosphere, we hope you'll feel at home in our vibrant city. Be sure to explore and experience all that Sabaudia has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arapongas Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Arapongas Airport is responsible for all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Regional De Maringa SBMG Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Regional De Maringa SBMG Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Londrina Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
